IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: DETROIT LIONS CHARITIES (CHARITIES) IS THE NONPROFIT COMMUNITY FUNDING EXTENSION OF DETROIT LIONS, INC. CHARITIES SUPPORTS TRANSFORMATIONAL EFFORTS IN DETROIT'S UNDERSERVED COMMUNITIES, FOCUSING ON SUSTAINABLE HEALTH AND WELLNESS INITIATIVES AND COMMUNITY WELLBEING. CHARITIES SUPPORTS ORGANIZATIONS THAT PURSUE INTEGRATED APPROACHES TO PHYSICAL FITNESS, HEALTHY EATING, EDUCATION, CANCER AND DOMESTIC VIOLENCE PREVENTION.

IRS990.Desc: SUPPORTING THE METROPOLITAN DETROIT COMMUNITY THROUGH GRANTS TO LOCAL CHARITIES FOCUSING ON THE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL WELL-BEING AND OTHER WELLNESS INITIATIVES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SUPPORTING DETROIT AREA YOUTH PROGRAMS THROUGH EXERCISE, HEALTHY EATING AND TRANSPORTATION TO ACTIVITY BASED EVENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: PROGRAMS THAT BENEFIT CHILDREN AND YOUTH IN MICHIGAN BY SPONSORING THE STATE OF MICHIGAN HIGH SCHOOL COACH OF THE WEEK AND COACH OF THE YEAR PROGRAM.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: SUPPORT OF NATIONWIDE PROGRAMS PROMOTING MENTAL AND PHSYICAL WELL-BEING INITIATIVES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DETROIT LIONS CHARITIES CONSIDERS REQUESTS FROM OTHER 501 (C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS TO FUND COMMUNITY WORK IN THE CITY OF DETROIT AND SURROUNDING AREAS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE REQUESTS AND CHOOSES THE ONES TO BE SUPPORTED IN THE CURRENT YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MARTHA F. FORD, WILLIAM CLAY FORD JR., ELIZABETH FORD KONTULIS, SHEILA FIRESTONE HAMP AND MARTHA PARKE MORSE ALL HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP AND BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO COMMITTEES EXIST WITH THE AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TREASURER REVIEWS THE 990 AND THEN FORWARDS THE 990, HER COMMENTS, AND RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE REMAINING BOARD MEMBERS FOR APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENTITIES GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
INDEPENDENT AUDIT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WAS PERFORMED AND IS CURRENTLY IN THE PROCESS OF BEING FINALIZED, WITH THE STATEMENTS TO BE ISSUED BY JANUARY 31, 2019.
OVERSIGHT AND REVIEW PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
